infos.value: Heeey, Brother.
What?
What do you think Sadali's talking about with them?
...I believe you must have noticed it, too. We're being watched.
Right you are, Lord Sadali.
That must be Hourne's army.
I take no pleasure in being stranded here.
In other words, you'd like us toâ€”
Go and kill them all, aye!?
Certainly, my loyal subjects. I will even enlist the aid of the Sanctum's monks.
Is that a suitable arrangement?
Suitable? It's more than suitable, isn't it, Brother!?
Yeah! We'll wring 'em out, nice and flat-like, aye?
Will you be safe, Lord Sadali?
Without us, your loyal bodyguards...
There is no need to worry. Be on your way.
Wh-who...are they?
I've heard rumors about them. Lord Sadali's elite guards...
The rumors just so happen to be true.
They are "Whisper," "Murmur," and "Grace."
I have trained them to be the best of the best.
My life will never be in peril so long as these three are by my side.
Now, I'm counting on the two of you.
Th-they give me the creeps...
We can't allow the likes of them to be Lord Sadali's elite guards...
But first...
We've got some killing to do, aye!
All right, time to come out and play!
Come and show us what you're made of, aye!
